short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will analyze a page using desenmascara.me

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is out of date. Updated extension is available in:
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/desenmascarame-fake-web-v/egimhkfghkdkffalnjbkeoidpildondf


Scan any website with Desenmascara.me, free and easy. http://desenmascara.me

Have you purchased items from suspicious websites? Would you like to know more about the legitimacy of any website before doing any transaction on it?. This extension would help you to not be lured by online counterfeiters.

Desenmascara.me is a service that analyzes websites and let you know when a website is FAKE in relation to the online counterfeiting fraud. There are thousands of e-commerce websites selling unauthorized items of the most famous luxury, fashion and jewellery brands. This service will let you know whether a website is FAKE or not in relation to the online counterfeiting fraud.

Additionally all the flagged sites are reported to the affected brand through the twitter account https://twitter.com/desenmascarame

In the main home of the project: http://desenmascara.me you could check it out the good feedback received by the brands thanks to this free service.

Feel free to provide any feedback through the contact link in http://desenmascara.me
